author: Dan Lepard
serves: Makes enough for a 20cm/8in round cake
method: Mix the cocoa and icing sugar in a bowl. Melt the butter for a few seconds in the microwave, or in a small pan over a low heat. Mix the melted butter and the cream into the sugar and cocoa, and stir until smooth. Use while smooth enough to spread, or thin with a little boiling water for a runnier icing.
ingredients: 25g/1oz cocoa powder,  300g/10½oz icing sugar,  50g/1¾oz butter,  50ml/2fl oz double cream
